subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yuki Yanagita greeted Randy Choate with a two-run single in the eighth inning, and Japan beat the Major League Baseball All-Stars, 6-4, in an exhibition game in Naha, Japan.
snippet: Yuki Yanagita greeted Randy Choate with a two-run single in the eighth inning, and Japan beat the Major League Baseball All-Stars, 6-4, in an exhibition game in Naha, Japan.
